== Description ==
This function returns the [http://sourceforge.net/projects/kses <tt>kses</tt>] version number. 

== Usage ==
%%%<?php wp_kses_version() ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
None.

== Return Values ==
; (string) : [http://sourceforge.net/projects/kses <tt>KSES</tt>] Version Number
